# xecli
A Python CLI to manage xEclipsity tools and releases

## Installation
--
```bash
pip install xecli
```

# help / usage

```bash
xe help 

xe help --legacy # shows legacy (short) help command
```

---

# 1.0.5
```bash
- added dry run mode (--dry-run)
- improved help command 
- aliases are fully fixed
- improved logging
- debug mode
- updated doctor command
- and a few more tweaks
```

## Use of this
**You can use this to check, download, update, our tools with ease.**
